1.text: Pretending to be a dining room.
Some consider this room a masterpiece or a simulation
Some consider it to be a perfect figure of a perfect family
You are all free, all entered at the same time
But you are all asking yourself the same question.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: I’m so happy that we are all here together.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Honey this all looks great.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: Oh thank you. I cooked all day for YOU.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: The roasted vegetables with the rice look delicious!

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: I know it's your favorite!

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: And it’s my favorite too. It smells so so good, right daddy?

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Yes baby girl, my true pumpkin. Lets dig in.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Beautiful woman -how was your day?

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: It was fabulous. I was thinking about the other day. And how was your day, my love?

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Also, fantastic. And it’s getting better - There is no moon tonight.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: Dad, can you give me the pepper?

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Sure boy but don't put so much.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: Since I was seven I think everything should be tooooooo much!

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: I don’t think it will be much longer now.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: Something is wrong.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Can you stop humming?

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: No one asked me if I want the broccoli.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: did you see how your room looks like?

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: So.... How was school today kids?

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: Today was spectacular.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: Let me tell you that I had the best time! We learned that clouds are just a combination of water and air, nothing more.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: And if you touch them they disappear.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: That is fascinating.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: I don't understand how water can stay in the sky and not fall.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: It must be horrible to just be stck in between.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: I wish I had more room for the grilled potatoes.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: So how can they be real?

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: What is a rainbow?

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: What do you think Pumpkin?

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: Mmmmmmmm....

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: It is magic!

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: There is no magic. Only light and rain.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: It is raining now!

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: But there's no light now. Who wants roasted carrots? They are soooo good! I saw a recipe in the newspaper that I had to try. And I’ll tell you what? It’s divine!

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: I cannot refuse that!

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: I don't think it is the rain.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: Sweetheart, you wouldn’t believe who I saw today!

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Who honey?

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: The person from next door.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Interesting.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: A girl here is trying to say something!

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: It might have been equal to a coincidence.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: I don't like carrots.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: It is late and dark outside.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: I wonder what I will dream today.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: What do you want to dream about?

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: About our family together - Forever!

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: I want to dream about us melting in the sun!

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: That sounds lovely!

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: So many clocks here. Time is passing so fast.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: Where are we going?

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: Nowhere.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: I love you dear.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: Someone called here today.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: Who was it?

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: I wasn't the one who took the message.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: It was a man in a fake suit with a voice of a girl.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: I almost forgot. It must be the rain.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: And now it is getting darker.

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: I was wondering when mom is going to do that.

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: I am not sure. It happened only once.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: And then - there it was.

script-lines.speaker: dad
script-lines.text: I think it was deliciouse! Is that a cake I can smell in the kitchen?

script-lines.speaker: sister
script-lines.text: Can we have some?

script-lines.speaker: mom
script-lines.text: Yes. Let end it with a cake.

script-lines.speaker: brother
script-lines.text: Next time we need to start with a soup.
